title: David Bovill
synopsis: My name is David Bovill, and this is where I write about [[Cryptography]]. My nickname (and handle on twitter) is [https://twitter.com/fortyfoxes @fortyfoxes]. This unfortunate name stuck (it comes from a Turkish saying), as not many other people used it as a user name. At the time I also favoured the anonymity it offered.

title: My Neighbourhood
synopsis: A list of sites I own and write on. See [[Recent Changes]] for a list of all the things I've been writing.
